content.prompt: The conditions shown in the photograph emerged most directly as a result of which of the following?

choices.label: Overpopulation that forced farming families to migrate to urban centers
The movement to promote child labor to instill values of hard work and frugality
The preference of factory owners for a cheap labor force
The need for increased family income during the Great Depression

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
